summary: Admin dashboard UI changes partially implement the requested layout: the money-related buttons are grouped in a single bordered container, and the top summary area is redesigned into circular elements using aspect-square/rounded-full styling. However, the top summary circles do not clearly include the requested icon/label/value layout, and the sizing constraints (max width) may prevent the circles from spanning the full available width as required. The diff summary also indicates several unrelated authentication/session and other UI changes not requested by the BuildRequest.

missing_requirements.requirement: Top 3 summary items should be large circular buttons spanning full available screen width with consistent spacing and clear icon/label/value layout inside each circle.
missing_requirements.reason: AdminSummaryCards renders label + numeric value, but no icon is shown inside the circles; additionally, each circle is constrained with max-w-[140px], which may prevent the row from spanning the full available width on larger screens.

hallucinated_features.description: Added fixed header with ADMIN title and LOGOUT button, sticky summary area, and fixed footer layout changes in AdminPanel.
hallucinated_features.reason: BuildRequest only asked for top summary circles and a bordered container around three money buttons, and explicitly said not to change navigation behavior/routes beyond necessary layout restructuring; the added fixed/sticky shell and logout UI are additional, unrequested dashboard layout changes.

hallucinated_features.description: Authentication/session flow changes (e.g., removal of registration toggle, session profile update methods), safeStorage enhancements, notify helper, and multiple non-admin UI redesigns mentioned in summaries.
hallucinated_features.reason: These features are not part of the UI-only Admin dashboard layout requirements (REQ-1..REQ-3) and represent broader app changes beyond the request.
